1.0.10.name: wordpress/graceful-sidebar-plugin
1.0.10.description: This plugin enables you to customize your blog's sidebar using custom fields. Each page or post on your blog can have a custom sidebar entry. Drag the Graceful Sidebar widget to your theme's sidebar.
